zh.DevOpsHome.index.926510-2: 请根据业务需要对下述步骤进行选择性操作。
zh.DevOpsHome.index.926510-7: 根据业务需求自定义开发对应的产品（设备模型）接入协议，并上传到平台。
zh.DevOpsHome.index.926510-9: 统一维护平台内的证书，用于数据通信加密。
zh.DevOpsHome.index.926510-11: 根据不同的传输类型配置平台底层网络组件相关参数。
zh.DevOpsHome.index.926510-13: 根据不同的传输类型，关联消息协议，配置设备接入网关相关参数。
zh.DevOpsHome.index.926510-15: 监控系统日志，及时处理系统异常。

en.DevOpsHome.index.926510-1: Recommended steps for operation and maintenance management
en.DevOpsHome.index.926510-2: Please perform selective operations on the following steps according to business needs.
en.DevOpsHome.index.926510-7: Customize and develop corresponding product (device model) access protocols according to business needs, and upload them to the platform.
en.DevOpsHome.index.926510-9: Unified maintenance of certificates within the platform for data communication encryption.
en.DevOpsHome.index.926510-11: Configure platform underlying network component related parameters based on different transmission types.
en.DevOpsHome.index.926510-13: According to different transmission types, associate message protocols, and configure device access gateway related parameters.
en.DevOpsHome.index.926510-15: Monitor system logs and promptly handle system exceptions.
